notes.note: Sponsored by ACM, cTuning foundation and dividiti

Uses Collective Knowledge Framework to share resulting workflows and artifacts in a common format for a unified and unbiased benchmarking and to let the community reuse and build upon best found solutions

title: ReQuEST: 1st open, reproducible and Pareto efficient SW/HW co-design competition for deep learning (speed, accuracy, costs)

urls.title: Collective Knowledge Framework used to put systems and ML researchers on the same page and share AI artifacts as customized, reproducible, reusable and optimized components with a unified JSON API
Collective Knowledge Repository used to share, compare and reproduce optimization results from the participants
